value.title: Store data from PowerApps in sql, approve it in flow and use it in Power bI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will create a PowerApp that will store stopwords in a SQL table on an on-prem server. The PowerApp will log the user of the app and a timestamp. value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.
